title: Cambridge Analytica deceived Facebook users, says FTC
text: Firm engaged in deceptive practices about data for voter profiling and targeting and relating to EU-US Privacy Shield framework

title: 7 Strong Stocks to Buy That Won Q3 Earnings
text: These seven stocks to buy didn't just impress in third-quarter earnings. They will all win going into 2020, too.

title: 5 Safety Stocks to Buy Without Trade War Exposure
text: Tired of all the trade war volatility in markets? Consider buying these five safety stocks that are largely insulated from global trade.

title: Facebook's plans to label state media are complicated — and delayed
text: Social media companies are feeling their way in the dark, and sometimes fumbling their way through new efforts to fight misinformation on their platforms as they roll out rules that are meant to increase transparency.

title: Facebook has a theory that hiding 'likes' will increase post volume, and Instagram is testing it
text: Inside Facebook’s growth and data science teams, there is a hypothesis that getting rid of likes may be an effective tactic for getting users to post more original content on Instagram, three former employees told CNBC.

title: No Libra style digital currencies without rules, say EU finance ministers
text: European Union finance ministers have agreed a defacto ban on the launch in the region of so-called global ‘stablecoins’ such as Facebook’s planned Libra digital currency until the bloc has a common approach to regulation that can mitigate the risks posed by the technology.
